summary:
A Standalone Sword!
Adds a craftable and temperable "Estoc" to the game.
Added to Silver Hand weapon lists.
descriptionHtml:
=========================================================================================================================
A new weapon mod from me!
This time altering the mesh for the silver weapon.

This is a standalone weapon mod, by the way. Will not replace anything!

I attempted to create an Estoc looking sword, within Skyrim's limit of course.

An [b]Estoc[/b], or English "[b]Tuck[/b]", is a two handed thrusting sword capable of piercing armor. It has [i][b]NO blade[/b][/i].
[i]...Looking at you, Dark Souls...[/i]

Now don't get excited. I said this is within Skyrim's limit.

This "Estoc" [i](more like a swag sword...)[/i][b] IS[/b] capable of piercing armored opponents. A [b]whopping 25%[/b] I might add. Armored opponents including Heavy and Light armors, Dwemer Automatons, and Dragons. Yes,[b] Dragons[/b].

This "Estoc" is also one handed...
[i]"Why?" [/i]
Thanks for asking! I have [b]three[/b] (3) Reasons:

1.)Swords are typically sheathed at the waist.
2.)Skyrim's Two-handed animations are a little more barbaric than the one handed animations.
3.)Stabbing with swords in Skyrim? That's too realistic! Save that for the flashy killmoves!
========================================================================================================================

ALRIGHT, THAT'S ENOUGH BORING BASHING OF [b]SKYRIM'S LIMITATIONS[/b] AND BORING [b]ESTOC RAMBLING[/b]!
SHOW ME THE [b]SWORDFAX[/b]!

[i]Okay okay... calm down.
[/i]
The damage lies between a Skyforge Steel Dagger and Sword.
The speed is in between a sword and dagger.
The reach is in between Sword and Greatsword.
Stagger rate is lower than a sword and higher than a dagger.

Ultimately, it's low in damage compared to a sword, but it's fast, long, and can penetrate armor.Â  Please, if anyone can suggest any tweaks to improve balance if needed, please say something!

To craft you'll need: the Steel Smithing Perk, 2 Silver Ingots, 1 Leather Strips, and 1 Steel Ingot
To Upgrade you'll need only 1 Silver Ingot.

The Weapon is also silver, it has the same abilities as a silver weapon.

Any texture mods that alter Silver Weapons is compatible.

For the Screenshots I used the following Visual Mods:
Bethesda HD Texture DLC
VandB enb Nature
ELFX
SweetFX for Sharpening
